resources.string:
We are proud to say that this app isn't capable of transmitting any data over the internet because it requests no permissions from you, the user.

All data is stored within a SQLite database on your device which cannot be accessed remotely.

Please enjoy using this application which respects your privacy - we're just as fed up of privacy invasion being the norm as you are.

If you would like to audit the source code for yourself - this app is also open source.
